amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Access to Jobs Grant program by $108 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in part 2 of House Rept. 105-476, to increase funding authorize in the bill for the Access to Jobs pilot program by $108 million, from $42 million to $150 million.

action.text: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 175 (Roll No. 94).
